alert.note: Alert for Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:02PM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Androscoggin River At Gorham affecting Oxford and Coos Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Androscoggin River at Gorham. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding begins at the parking lot of businesses along Main Street north of Church Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Tuesday was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
